title: FAQ
subtitle: Things we get asked a lot

questions.label: What services do you offer?
questions.content: We offer a range of services including web design, web development, branding, and photography. We can also help with SEO and social media marketing.

questions.label: Can you teach me how to make a website?
questions.content: We don't offer courses at the moment, but we can recommend resources and advice to help you get the most out of your learning.

questions.label: How much does a project cost?
questions.content: The cost of a project depends on many factors, such as the size of the project, the features, the development time, etc. The initial amount of my web services starts at 500€, with an average between 1000€ and 3000€. For any other design or consulting service, We usually charge 450€ per day.

questions.label: How does payment work for a project?
questions.content: We ask for a 40% deposit before starting a project, and the remaining 60% after successful delivery. We accept payments by bank transfer, PayPal, etc...

questions.label: How long does a project take?
questions.content: It's difficult to give an exact estimate, as each project is different, but the majority of our past work has taken between 2 weeks and 2 months.

questions.label: Do you offer discounts?
questions.content: We offer a 15% discount for students and non-profit organizations.
